#include <iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
inline int f()
{
        int noRead=0;
        char p=getchar_unlocked();
        for(; p<33;) {
                p=getchar_unlocked();
        };
        while(p>32) {
                noRead = (noRead << 3) + (noRead << 1) + (p - '0');
                p=getchar_unlocked();
        }
        return noRead;
};


int freq[10000][102];
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int N,Q,i,x,y,cnt,j;
	for(i=0;i<=100;i++) freq[0][i]=0;
	N=f(); Q=f();
	
	for(i=1;i<=N;i++)
	{
		
		x=f();
		for(j=1;j<=100;j++)
		{
			if(j==x)
				freq[i][x]=freq[i-1][x]+1;
			else freq[i][j]=freq[i-1][j];
		}
	}
	while(Q--)
	{
		cnt=0;
		x=f(); y=f();
		for(i=1;i<=100;i++)
		{
			if( freq[y][i]-freq[x-1][i]>0)
				cnt++;
		}
		printf("%d\n",cnt);
	}
	return 0;
}
